name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on Communications and Future Internet
content: Conference Proceedings: Submitted papers will go through a rigorous peer review process, and finally accepted papers after registration and presentation will be published in the ICCFI 2024 conference proceedings and submitted to IEEE Xplore and indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Journal: Journal of Communications (Website: http://www.jocm.us/, DOI: 10.12720/jcm, Abbreviated Title: J. Commun.) ISSN: 1796-2021 (Online); 2374-4367 (Print) Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus; DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc. CiteScore: 1.9 (2021)
